title: DataContract
description: A `DataContract` entity defines the schema and quality guarantees for a data asset.

contractUpdate.description: Record of updates to the data contract.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the contract was updated.

impersonatedBy.description: Bot user that performed the action on behalf of the actual user.

changeDescription.description: Description of changes made to the contract.

version.description: Version number of the contract after the update.

rowFilter.description: Filter that defines what subset of the data is accessible to certain consumers

policy.description: Intended consumers of the data (e.g. internal teams, external partners, etc.)

accessPolicy.title: Access Policy
accessPolicy.description: Reference to an access policy ID or name that should govern this data

identities.title: Consumer AD Groups
identities.description: List of groups that are intended consumers of the data

rowFilters.title: Row Data Filters
rowFilters.description: List of filters that define what subset of the data is accessible to the consumers

dataClassification.title: Data Classification
dataClassification.description: Expected data classification (e.g. Confidential, PII, etc.)

policies.title: Data Consumers
policies.description: Intended consumers of the data (e.g. internal teams, external partners, etc.)

contractSLA.description: Service Level Agreement expectations (timeliness, availability, etc.)

refreshFrequency.title: Refresh Frequency
refreshFrequency.description: Expected frequency of data updates (e.g. every 1 day)

maxLatency.title: Maximum Latency
maxLatency.description: Maximum acceptable latency between data generation and availability (e.g. 4 hours)

availabilityTime.title: Availability Time
availabilityTime.description: Time of day by which data is expected to be available (e.g. "09:00 UTC")

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone for the availability time. UTC by default.

retention.title: Data Retention Period
retention.description: How long the data is retained (if relevant)

columnName.title: Column Name
columnName.description: Column that represents the refresh time of the data (if applicable)

id.description: Unique identifier of this data contract instance.

displayName.description: Display name of the data contract.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Fully qualified name of the data contract.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

impersonatedBy.description: Bot user that performed the action on behalf of the actual user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp in Unix epoch time milliseconds corresponding to when the data contract was created.

createdBy.description: User or Bot who created the data contract.

href.description: Link to this data contract resource.

entityStatus.description: Approval status of the data contract.

entity.description: Reference to the data entity (table, topic, etc.) this contract applies to.

testSuite.description: Reference to the test suite that contains tests related to this data contract.

schema.description: Schema definition for the data contract.

semantics.description: Semantics rules defined in the data contract.

termsOfUse.description: Terms of use for the data contract for both human and AI agents consumption.

security.title: Contract Security
security.description: Security and access policy expectations defined in the data contract.

sla.title: Contract SLA
sla.description: Service Level Agreement expectations defined in the data contract.

qualityExpectations.description: Quality expectations defined in the data contract.

contractUpdates.description: History of updates to the data contract.

reviewers.description: User references of the reviewers for this data contract.

effectiveFrom.description: Date from which this data contract is effective.

effectiveUntil.description: Date until which this data contract is effective.

changeDescription.description: Change that led to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Incremental change description of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

sourceUrl.description: Source URL of the data contract.

latestResult.description: Latest validation result for this data contract.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.
